channel.title: Eva Longoria on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Eva Longoria to Direct Mystery ‘Anita De Monte Laughs Last’ for Searchlight
item.description: Xochitl Gonzalez will adapt her novel about a first-generation Ivy League art student who uncovered a forgotten artist from the 1980s who had a suspicious death.
